attributes.action: Deliver an EU Referendum in 2016 not 2017.
attributes.additional_details: Freedom of movement within the EU is the REAL reason Britain can't control it's borders. Being a part of the EU make everything we purchase more expensive. Britain can't afford to be a member any longer. Delivery the referendum in 2016 not 2017.
attributes.background: The EU Referendum needs to happen in 2016, not 2017. Every day the EU tightens it's grip on Britain, just like a ball and chain. To make Britain, Britain again it is crucial to leave the EU sooner rather than later and to deliver the Referendum sooner for the people.
